column4: can someone help me be able to play media on vlc from a windows network?
hmm, can you tell us a bit more? thanks!
ok, so you have no debug  message. to get one just start vlc from the command line and open the media file
anything in particular i should be looking for?
you can pastebin the output if you want and we take a look at it
sorry it took so long, first time doing that :)  http://paste.ubuntu.com/135032/
you need to replace $media-file with one of your media files ($media-file is a place holder only)
ok, but local files work fine
we were talking about remote files, right?
would a local file yeild anything useful
where in the file system do i find the mounted shared folder?
